name: Loop Racer (itch)
description:
My Ludum dare game! This was made over 72 hours  for Ludum Dare 47 and the theme was "Stuck in a loop". (Volume warning, potentially loud music cuts in very quickly at the start ^^;)

Controls are arrow keys or wasd, use Space to advance dialogue. Have fun!

Thanks to my friend Leo who worked on the music and sound with me! You can find him here.
https://soundcloud.com/meowitzer

And special thanks to my friend Robyn who supported me throughout the tenuous coding process!

Extra race track assets from Kenney.dl who provides free game models and assets! They were a life saver here.
